PersonCompetency.name: PersonCompetency
PersonCompetency.description: Represents information about a competency that a person has.

CompetencyId.description: Required. The competency associated with the person competency.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the compentency is no longer effective for the person.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the competency is effective for the person.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the person competency.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

PersonId.description: Required. The person associated with the person competency.

ProficiencyLevel.description: Specifies the person's level of proficiency in the competency.

VerificationDate.description: The date when the competency was verified for the person.

VerificationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the competency's verification for the person.

VerificationSummary.description: The details and conclusions from the verification of the competency for the person.
